content.text: Hi! What do you do for a living?
I'm a nurse. I enjoy working with my team and getting to help people.
That's great! I work in retail. It's not always easy, but I enjoy helping customers find what they're looking for.
I know what you mean. Retail can be tough, but it's rewarding when you can help someone find what they need.
I agree! What are your hobbies?
I love to spend time with my cats. They're my best friends.
Aww, that's sweet. I have a dog. He's my best friend too.
What kind of dog do you have?
He's a Golden Retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
Golden Retrievers are so cute! I've always wanted one.
Have you had him for long?
Yeah, he's about 3 years old now.
Wow, he must be a big boy!
He's a big guy, but he's still a puppy at heart.
Sounds like he's a great dog.
He is! I'm so glad I have him.
